{% verbatim %}

Class Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::BatchAnnotateFilesRequest

A list of requests to annotate files using the BatchAnnotateFiles API.

Methods

#requests

#requests => ::Array<::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::AnnotateFileRequest>
Returns
Type Description
::Array<::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::AnnotateFileRequest>

Required. The list of file annotation requests. Right now we support only one AnnotateFileRequest in BatchAnnotateFilesRequest.

#requests=

#requests=(value) => ::Array<::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::AnnotateFileRequest>
Returns
Type Description
::Array<::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::AnnotateFileRequest>

Required. The list of file annotation requests. Right now we support only one AnnotateFileRequest in BatchAnnotateFilesRequest.

#parent

#parent => ::String
Returns
Type Description
::String

Optional. Target project and location to make a call.

Format: projects/{project-id}/locations/{location-id}.

If no parent is specified, a region will be chosen automatically.

Supported location-ids:

`us`: USA country only,
`asia`: East asia areas, like Japan, Taiwan,
`eu`: The European Union.

Example: projects/project-A/locations/eu.

#parent=

#parent=(value) => ::String
Returns
Type Description
::String

Optional. Target project and location to make a call.

Format: projects/{project-id}/locations/{location-id}.

If no parent is specified, a region will be chosen automatically.

Supported location-ids:

`us`: USA country only,
`asia`: East asia areas, like Japan, Taiwan,
`eu`: The European Union.

Example: projects/project-A/locations/eu.
